title: Lit / Case Opening
subtitle: 53 tasks — Client Orientation through Court Filing Notice

tasks.label: Call Attempt 1
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V1, send SMS 1, send Email 1, mark "Call Attempt 1 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Attempt 2
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V2, send SMS 2, send Email 2, mark "Call Attempt 2 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Attempt 3
tasks.sla: By 4pm on the second day from being assigned
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V3, send SMS 3, send Email 3, mark "Call Attempt 3 Complete"

tasks.label: Send Introduction / Contact Letter
tasks.function: If no contact by the beginning of the 5th day, the letter is automatically sent by the system

tasks.label: Call Attempt 4
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V4, send SMS 4, send Email 4, mark "Call Attempt 4 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Attempt 5
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V5, send SMS 5, send Email 5, mark "Call Attempt 5 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Attempt 6
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V6, send SMS 6, send Email 6, mark "Call Attempt 6 Complete"

tasks.label: Send No Contact Letter
tasks.function: If no contact by the beginning of the 5th day, the letter is automatically sent by the system

tasks.label: Call Attempt 7
tasks.sla: Day 6 from the day the letter is sent
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V7, send SMS 7, send Email 7, mark "Call Attempt 7 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Attempt 8
tasks.sla: Day 7 from the day the letter is sent
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V8, send SMS 8, send Email 8, mark "Call Attempt 8 Complete"

tasks.label: Back to Intake as MIA
tasks.sla: Completion of the day 7 Atty call
tasks.function: Case is routed back to Intake to re-establish communications

tasks.label: Send Cut Letter
tasks.function: If no contact after a full week of pursuit by the Intake team, the letter is automatically sent by the system

tasks.label: Orientation Appointment
tasks.sla: 24 hours from being assigned but this also needs to be connected to linkage from pursuit
tasks.function: If completed, mark "Complete"
tasks.notes:
Agenda: 
Litigation Transfer Call Agenda
Client Introduction & Case Validation Conference
Purpose of the call:
Welcome the client into the litigation phase, confirm the accuracy of core facts, identify risks or missing information, and ensure the legal team is positioned to move aggressively and efficiently.

1) Welcome & Team Introduction
Introduce litigation attorney, paralegal, and any case support staff.
Provide direct contact information and preferred communication methods.
Explain each...

tasks.label: Clent Profile Scoring
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from when SOL is approved and BI Limites are obtained
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
It would be required that these scores be re-scored or a “No Change” score entered, every time a case manager progressed a case. Again, this is only for the case profile. These dials would be shown in a dashboard at the top of every matter panel view. 

Any thoughts? Additions? Revisions? 

“What...

Input all needed info for below: 

“What to do” box: 
•        “If Demand-Ready % < X → add demand sprint + records chase”
•        “If gaps > X → treatment monitoring protocol triggers”
•        “If liability score low → early lit evaluation”

“Top 10 Action List” widget
•        A live list that updates daily:
o        Oldest demands not sent
o        Highest value cases missing records
o        Top cases with expiring deadlines
o        Top 10 stalled negotiations
o        Top 10 clients at...

tasks.label: Liability Profile Scoring System
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from when SOL is approved and BI Limites are obtained
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
Defense Pressure & Settlement Leverage Model

Purpose

This model measures:

1. How difficult it is for the defense to escape fault
2. How predictable a jury outcome would be
3. How expensive and risky it is for the carrier to fight

When measured consistently, these scores become powerful...

Liability setup and scoring

tasks.label: Policy & Collectability Scoring System
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from when SOL is approved and BI Limites are obtained
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
Transportation 
No insurance, auto or health - will it work to give a letter of protection (LOP)

Recovery Power & Payment Predictability Model

Purpose

This system measures:
•        How much insurance money is realistically available
•        How difficult it will be to access it
•        How...

Policy setup and scoring

tasks.label: Treatment Strength Index (TSI)
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from when SOL is approved and BI Limites are obtained
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
A structured way to rate the **quality, seriousness, credibility, and profitability** of medical treatment.

You can use 1–5 scales, color ratings, or weighted points.

Body parts are experiencing pain
Pain levels
New injury or an excacerbated injury
Fracture or a scar



The 5 Master Treatment...

Treatment setup and scoring

tasks.label: Comprehensive Case Performance Index (CPI)
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from when SOL is approved and BI Limites are obtained
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
“How strong is this file as a business asset?”
This index measures how efficiently, profitably, and strategically viable the case is — independent of liability, policy, treatment, or client personality.

The 7 Pillars of the Case Performance Index
Each scored 0–20
Total = 0–140
Converted to 0–100...

Case scoring

tasks.label: Send letter to all medical providers with PIP/health ins info
tasks.function: As soon as the orientation appt is done this gets sent

tasks.label: Send letter to prior counsel and prior medical providers for records and films
tasks.function: As soon as the orientation appt is done this gets sent

tasks.label: Request ERISA/Medicaid/Medicare/MVA liens
tasks.function: As soon as the orientation appt is done this gets sent

tasks.label: Request PIP No Fault Ledger
tasks.function: As soon as the orientation appt is done this gets sent

tasks.label: Request Med Pay
tasks.function: As soon as the orientation appt is done this gets sent

tasks.label: Requesting evidence: photos, shoes, out of pocket expenses
tasks.function: As soon as the orientation appt is done this gets sent
tasks.notes: Requesting evidence: photos, shoes, out of pocket expenses

tasks.label: Submission task
tasks.sla: 20 min from the completion of the OA
tasks.function: Once completed, mark complete
tasks.notes: OPRA request for supplemental police report, EMS report, body cam footage

tasks.label: Request missing medical records, diag films, medical bills
tasks.sla: 20 min from the completion of the OA
tasks.function: Submit as is currently established in Litify
tasks.notes: Submit the request from the medical dept

tasks.label: Review the file to verify all defendants are properly listed in Litify role object
tasks.sla: 20 min from the completion of the OA
tasks.function: Review for accuracy, mark complete

tasks.label: Draft complaint
tasks.sla: 3 days after completioin of the OA
tasks.function: Complaint submission for review, mark complete

tasks.label: Approve Complaint
tasks.sla: 6 days after completion of the OA
tasks.function: Review complaint, mark complete

tasks.label: Filing the complaint
tasks.function: Compaint filed, mark complete

tasks.label: Service of Summons & Complaint
tasks.sla: 1 hour from recieving the filed complaint from the court
tasks.function: Assigning summons & complaint to the process server for service, mark complete
tasks.notes: Send the summons and complaint to the process server to effectuate service

tasks.label: Uploading the affidavit of service to the court and then uploading the file copy from the court to Litify
tasks.sla: 1 hour from recieving the affidavit from the process server
tasks.function: Uploading the affidavit of service to the court and then uploading the file copy from the court to Litify, mark complete

tasks.label: Court initial filing notice from the court
tasks.function: Once recieved, mark complete
tasks.notes: Court initial filing notice from the court

tasks.label: Follow Up Request 1
tasks.function: Submit Litify chatter, mark "Follow Up Request 1" as complete, if medical records recieved, mark "Medical Records Recived"
tasks.notes: Follow up on the work getting done by medical records

tasks.label: Follow Up Request 2
tasks.function: Submit Litify chatter, mark "Follow Up Request 2" as complete, if medical records recieved, mark "Medical Records Recived"
tasks.notes: Follow up on the work getting done by medical records

tasks.label: Follow Up Request 3
tasks.function: Submit Litify chatter, mark "Follow Up Request 3" as complete, if medical records recieved, mark "Medical Records Recived"
tasks.notes: Follow up on the work getting done by medical records

tasks.label: Call/Chatter Attempt 1
tasks.function: Call or Submit Litify chatter, mark "Management Follow Up Request 1" as complete, if medical records recieved, mark "Medical Records Recived"
tasks.notes: Follow up on the work getting done by medical records

tasks.label: Call/Chatter Attempt 2
tasks.function: Call or Submit Litify chatter, mark "Management Follow Up Request 2" as complete, if medical records recieved, mark "Medical Records Recived"
tasks.notes: Follow up on the work getting done by medical records

tasks.label: Call/Chatter Attempt 3
tasks.function: Call or Submit Litify chatter, mark "Management Follow Up Request 3" as complete, if medical records recieved, mark "Medical Records Recived"
tasks.notes: Follow up on the work getting done by medical records

tasks.label: Draft a subpoena for medical records, bills, or films
tasks.function: Draft and mail/service subpeona to medical provider and cc defense counsel, mark complete
tasks.notes: Subpoena for medical records, bills, or films

tasks.label: Uploading proof of service
tasks.function: Uploading proof of service and save to the pleadings folder in Litify, mark complete

tasks.label: File a motion to enforce litigants rights
tasks.function: File a motion to enforce litigants rights, upload copy to the motions folder, and calender the motion under the motions object in Litify, mark complete
tasks.notes: File a motion to enforce litigants rights

tasks.label: Draft the summons and request service
tasks.sla: 15 days from OA, unless longer than 20 days from assignment, then 1 day from OA
tasks.function: Once drafted, and service initiated, mark complete
tasks.notes: Draft the summons and request service

tasks.label: Proof of service
tasks.function: Once verify, mark complete

tasks.label: Resolving non-service
tasks.function: Once verify, mark complete
tasks.notes: Postal search, skip trace, court search, DMV search

tasks.label: Resolving non-service
tasks.function: File a motion, upload copy to the motions folder, and calender the motion under the motions object in Litify, mark complete

tasks.label: File afadavits of service
tasks.function: File, save in pleadings folder, mark complete

tasks.label: File request to enter default
tasks.function: File, save in pleadings folder, mark complete

tasks.label: Sending the filed request to enter default to defendant and insurance carrier, via certified and regular mail
tasks.function: As soon as the request to enter default is submitted this happens immediately
tasks.notes: Sending the filed request to enter default to defendant and insurance carrier, via certified and regular mail

tasks.label: Supportive Doc Production 1
tasks.function: Draft and process supportive doc production, mark complete

tasks.label: Supportive Doc Production 2
tasks.function: Draft and process supportive doc production, mark complete

tasks.label: Supportive Doc Production 3
tasks.function: Draft and process supportive doc production, mark complete

tasks.label: Court filing notice
tasks.function: Once recieved, mark complete, upload to Litify, mark complete
tasks.notes: Inputing filing notice has been recieved
